sections.PURPOSE: Train the efficient application of engagement and movement techniques, target acquisition, weapons manipulation, and ability to conduct rapid reloads while stationary or moving.
sections.MISSION: 3/2CR conducts Close Quarters Combat Range IOT train the efficient application of engagement and movement techniques and build confidence on individual weapons systems.
sections.END STATE:
All firers conduct a Table VI Certification with 70 percent of their shots inside the zone 5 of the B-7 target and no shots outside of zone 4 or 5.
Concept of the Operation: This OPN will be conducted in III Phases:
Phase I (Planning & Prep): Begins with identifying personnel to be trained and provide range support and ends when Range Support personnel SP to Range 124 NLT 200700JUL23.
sections.KEY TASKS:
100% accountability of MWE, police call range, range cleared, ammo pickup, and safe movement back to RB.
Service & Support: Class I: A-M-A
Class V: TB IV: 32rds/Firer (AB57); TB V&VI: 40rds/Firer (AB57)
Medical Support: PLT Medics
sections.EXECUTION: ): Begins when range support personnel SP to Range 124 and ends when training is complete NLT 211500JUL23.
